conversations.content: What scores did users Olivia Smith, Mia Anderson, and Mason Thompson give in the feedback provided in the file 'feedback.xlsx'?

<function_thought>

For that, I will execute the search_files_by_filename function with the filename 'feedback.xlsx'. This will help me retrieve the file ID needed for further actions.
